lom:description.lom:string: This page is a means of sharing information about the teaching of the concepts of programming languages, especially undergraduate survey courses and courses about programming language semantics. The information shared includes homework and test problems. This page does not include information about courses aimed at teaching some specific programming language (as a means of teaching programming skills). Also outside the scope of this page will be information about courses in compiler construction.

lom:title.lom:string: The Teaching about Programming Languages Project
